name: migr_tetris
description:
Windows only. test build of the MIGR.dll framework. a small fully featured game kit for C ( and languages with FFI ) 

This is really just a showcase for the MIGR gamekit. not necessarily the best Tetris. Though it is pretty good fun.

Controls

"Z" or "Space" or "Enter" select option in menus.

"Cursor left + right" move piece.

"Cursor down" fall faster.

"Z + X" rotate piece.

'Spacebar" slam piece.

"Enter" pause.

"Shift" hold piece.
